title: Brooklyn Summer Beer, Wine & Spirits Fest
description: Try beer, wine, and spirits from around the world at the Brooklyn Navy Yard Waterfront Promenade on Saturday, August 3. Tickets include unlimited tastings and a souvenir tasting glass.
address: Brooklyn Navy Yard Building 77 Waterfront Promenade, 141 Flushing Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11205

title: Silent Movie Week
description: Museum of Modern Art (Midtown) presents Silent Movie Week.

title: 47th Asian American International Film Festival
description: Various locations and online host the 47th Asian American International Film Festival.

title: Festival of Cinema NYC
description: Various locations host the Festival of Cinema NYC.

title: She NYC Arts Summer Theater Festival
description: The annual She NYC Arts Summer Theater Festival showcases original works by women, trans, and non-binary writers and composers at the Connelly Theater (East Village).

title: Lincoln Center's Summer for the City
description: Lincoln Center hosts 200+ free or choose-what-you-pay concerts, dance parties, performances, film screenings, and more.

title: 21st Cinekink NYC
description: Wild Project (East Village) hosts the 21st Cinekink NYC film festival.

title: Summer Sounds at Manhattan West
description: Manhattan West (Midtown West at 385 9th Avenue) hosts a free series of weekly performances by musicians from around the globe.

title: Live at the Gantries
description: Kupferberg Center for the Arts presents Live at the Gantries, an annual outdoor concert series at Gantry Plaza State Park featuring Fabio Rojas Quintet (Latin Jazz).

title: 46th Annual BRIC Celebrate Brooklyn! Festival
description: NYC's longest-running, free, outdoor performing arts festival returns with concerts, films, dance, and more featuring Thee Sacred Souls and La Lom at Lena Horne Bandshell in Prospect Park (Brooklyn).
address: Lena Horne Bandshell, Prospect Park, Brooklyn

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Photophobia
description: Brooklyn Commons Park (Downtown Brooklyn) hosts a free outdoor movie screening of Photophobia (weather permitting).

title: Drop In: Comedy
description: Mia Jackson and Isabel Hagen present a comedy show at Two Boots Pizza in Park Slope, featuring standup by Katie Hannigan, Aaron Rosen, and Dough Smith. Free beer from 7:30-8:00 pm (one/person).

title: Swan Song with Neve Campbell + Chelsea McMullan
description: IFC Center (Greenwich Village) presents a screening of Chelsea McMullan's ballet documentary Swan Song, followed by Q&A with McMullan and executive producer Neve Campbell.

title: Cherry on Top Comedy
description: Dairy Queen's Savannah Desormeaux and Jenny Gorelick pair stand-up with ice cream at Cherry on Top, a comedy show in an ice cream shop featuring a female, queer, and non-binary lineup.
